English: Like you think, I have never been on a road as bad as this one off-ramp from the highway
where you had to take it so slow because it had potholes
and there were two guys there in this small bucket and a couple of shovels.
They needed so much bigger machinery to fix this road.
But we managed to take our suburban and a driver, well, hired a driver with a suburban,
and he took us to these small towns.
Chinese: 就像你想象的那样，我从未走过比这条高速公路出口匝道更差的路
你必须开得很慢，因为它布满坑洼
而且那里有两个男人在那个小桶里，还有一两把铁锹。
他们需要大得多的机械设备才能修好这条路。
但我们设法带着我们的郊区车和一个司机，呃，雇了个开郊区车的司机，
他把我们送到了那些小镇。

and there were two guys there in this small bucket and a couple of shovels.
They needed so much bigger machinery to fix this road.
But we managed to take our suburban and a driver, well, hired a driver with a suburban, and he took us to these small towns.
Chinese: 就像你想象的那样，我从未走过比这条高速公路出口匝道更差的路，你必须开得很慢，因为它布满坑洼
而且那里有两个男人在那个小桶里，还有一两把铁锹。
他们需要大得多的机械设备才能修好这条路。
但我们设法带着我们的郊区车和一个司机，呃，雇了个开郊区车的司机，他把我们送到了那些小镇。

input: Like you think, I have never been on a road as bad as this one off-ramp from the highway where you had to take it so slow because it had potholes and there were two guys there in this small bucket and a couple of shovels. It was hopeless. They needed so much bigger machinery to fix this road. But we managed to take our suburban and a driver, well, hired a driver with a suburban, and he took us to these small towns. The wildlife was really cool.
